content: Yes, it is very likely that we will see more hospitals implementing VR technology in the future. As the technology continues to advance, it is becoming more accessible and cost-effective. Moreover, as hospitals continue to find new ways to improve patient experiences and outcomes, VR provides a promising solution. By implementing VR programs, hospitals can improve both the quality of care and the patient experience. As patients become more tech-savvy, they may also come to expect VR technology as a standard part of their care. Overall, the future of VR in healthcare looks bright, and we can expect to see more innovative applications of this technology in the years to come.
